messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: All crewmembers recieve equal pay of 5 cents

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: All pay is equal under glorious motherland,  all gear is free and vending machines are now free

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Comrades, it appears bourgua spies going by the name of the lings have infilitrated the station, hunt them down and execute them, glory to the ussr and its people

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Concer outside of command, songs done by comrade clown

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.
